amendment.description: To assure that funding is provided for veterans health care each fiscal year to cover increases in population and inflation.

action.text: Amendment SA 3409 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3409 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 48. Record Vote Number: 145.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3409.

Amendment SA 3409 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Daschle. (consideration: CR S7128-7129; text: CR S7128-7129) To assure that funding is provided for veterans health care each fiscal year to cover increases in population and inflation.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3409 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 48. Record Vote Number: 145.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3409 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Daschle.
